Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Repeals subsection (i) of section 612 of the tax law relating to the elimination of the personal income tax deduction for percentage depletion; repealer
Summary: Repeals provisions relating to the elimination of the personal income tax deduction for percentage depletion and makes technical corrections.
LawCode: Rpld §612 sub§ (i), sub§ (b) ¶10, sub§ (c) ¶13, amd §618, Tax L; amd §11-1712, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to making technical corrections thereto; to repeal subsection (i) of section 612 of the tax law relating to the elimination of the personal income tax deduction for percentage depletion; and to repeal certain provisions of the tax law relating thereto
